io.barracks.ota.client.helper

Class UpdateCheckHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • io.barracks.ota.client.helper.UpdateCheckHelper

  • public class UpdateCheckHelper
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    A helper which makes it easier to use the UpdateCheckService.

    Use bind(Context, UpdateCheckCallback) before requesting for an udpate, and unbind(Context) when you are done using the helper.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult

      • bind

        public void bind(android.content.Context context,
                 UpdateCheckCallback callback)
        Call this method to register your callback before checking for an update.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.
        callback - The UpdateCheckCallback which will be called during the request.

      • unbind

        public void unbind(android.content.Context context)
        Call this method to unregister your callback and free the resources when you are done with this helper.
        Parameters:
        context - The context.

      • requestUpdate

        public void requestUpdate(UpdateDetailsRequest request)
        Call this method to request details about an update to the Barracks platform.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be sent to the Barracks platform.
